channel.title: Battle Mountain|Lander County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Battle Mountain|Lander County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: NV-305 North at I-80 - Battle Mountain
item.description: NV-305 North at I-80 in Battle Mountain. Turn right for I-80 East to Elko; continue over freeway for I-80 West to Winnemucca and for NV-305 North to Battle Mountain.

item.title: NV-305 North - Battle Mountain
item.description: Entering Battle Mountain on NV-305 North. Elevation 4505 Feet. Battle Mountain is the unincorporated county seat of Lander County.

item.title: NV-305 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-305 south. Distance to Jct. US-50 and Austin.

item.title: NV-305 South - Battle Mountain
item.description: NV-305 South in Battle Mountain

item.title: BL-80 East/NV-304 East (Front St.) at NV-305 (Broad St.)
item.description: BL-80 East/NV-304 East (Front St.) at NV-305 (Broad St.) in Battle Mountain.

item.title: BL-80 East/NV-304 East at NV-305 South
item.description: BL-80 East/NV-304 East (Front St.) at NV-305 South (Broad St.) to Austin. Continue on BL-80/NV-304 for Elko.

item.title: BL-80 East/NV-304 East - Entering Battle Mountain
item.description: Entering Battle Mountain (Elevation 4505 Feet) on BL-80 East/NV-304 East. Battle Mountain is the unincorporated county seat of Lander County Nevada.

item.title: BL-80/NV-304 East - Battle Mountain
item.description: BL-80/NV-304 East (Front St.) in Battle Mountain

item.title: BL-80 East/NV-304 East at I-80 West
item.description: BL-80 East/NV-304 East at I-80 West (Exit 229) in Battle Mountain. Use I-80 west for Winnemucca; BL-80/NV-304 East for Battle Mountain. This is the western end of the Battle Mountain business loop.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 229
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 229 - NV-304/West Battle Mountain

item.title: End BL-80/NV-304 East At I-80 East

item.title: BL-80/NV-304 East at I-80 West
item.description: BL-80/NV-304 East at I-80 West to Winnemucca. Use I-80 east for Elko.

item.title: End NV-806 South - Battle Mountain
item.description: End NV-806 South (Reese St.) at BL-80/NV-304 in Battle Mountain

item.title: End NV-305 North at BL-80/NV-304
item.description: End of NV-305 at BL-80/NV-304. Turn right on BL-80/NV-304 for Elko; turn left on BL-80/NV-304 for Winnemucca.

item.description: NV-305 North at I-80 West (Exit 231). Use I-80 west for Winnemucca. Continue north on NV-305 for Battle Mountain.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 231 Offramp at NV-305
item.description: I-80 East Exit 231 Offramp at NV-305 in Battle Mountain. Use NV-305 North for Battle Mountain; NV-305 South for Austin.
